{{Main|Mysterious Stone Slate|The Murals of Gurabad}}
'''Mysterious Stone Slate (I)''' is a Quest Item obtained from an [[Chest|Exquisite Chest]] found in [[The Sands of Three Canals]]. The chest will only be obtainable after having completed the [["The Falcon's Hunt"]] [[World Quest]].<br />
It and the other mysterious slates are used to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Murals of Gurabad]]''.
